alarmclock.author: Cleep
alarmclock.changelog:
## [1.1.0] - 2023-03-13
### Added
- Send unscheduled alarm event

### Changed
- Improve UI (add edit alarm)
- Add options to configure repeat and shuffle playlist

### Fixed
- Fix issue when multiple alarms scheduled for today and tomorrow. Only one was scheduled
- Fix issue during alarm scheduling
alarmclock.description: Build your own smart alarm clock
alarmclock.label: Alarm clock
alarmclock.longdescription: Configure time to wake up everyday

audio.author: Cleep
audio.changelog:
## [2.1.1] - 2023-03-10

### Fixed
- Change log level from error to info when audio driver can't be loaded at startup (surely no hardware)
- Move default sound files from core in brand new assets directory
- #1386 error installing "usb audio driver" issue

### Changed
- Improve unit tests
audio.label: Audio
audio.longdescription: Application that helps you to configure audio on your device

audioplayer.author: Cleep
audioplayer.changelog:
## [1.2.0] - 2023-03-11

### Fixed
- When playback stopped on UI, player stays alive

### Added
- Add way to configure repeat/shuffle playlist options at player creation
- Add function to start playback of specific playlist track
audioplayer.label: Audioplayer
audioplayer.longdescription:
This application provides a common way to play audio media on your device.
Application features:
  • Play most used audio formats (mp3, flac, ogg and aac)
  • Play local file and remote streams
  • Read audio metadata when available
  • Implement minimalist player playlist
  • Propagate significative player events

charts.author: Cleep
charts.description: Follow easily your sensors values graphically.
charts.label: Charts
charts.longdescription:
Charts application automatically generates charts according to your connected sensors values.
It allows you to follow in time the evolution of the measurements of your sensors

cleepbus.author: Cleep
cleepbus.description: Enables communications between all your Cleep devices through your home network
cleepbus.label: Cleepbus
cleepbus.longdescription: Application that enables communication between devices

developer.author: Cleep
developer.changelog:
## [3.1.0] - 2023-03-14

### Fixed
- Handle command failure (return code different from 0)
- Reset analyze error flag when running new analysis
- Improve code quality (black+lint)

### Changed
- Improve app creation: temporarily disable cleep-cli watch and add infos dialog
- Add some log messages
developer.description: Helps you to develop Cleep applications.
developer.label: Developer
developer.longdescription:
Developer module helps you to develop on Cleep installing and preconfiguring sync tools. It also provides a full page that helps you to check and build your own application.
This module will provide the official way to publish your module on Cleep market.

Lot of resources are available on developer module wiki, have a look and start enjoying Cleep!

fourletterdisplay.author: Cleep
fourletterdisplay.changelog:
## [1.1.0] - 2023-03-13
### Changed
* Update on_render parameter names according to core
* Do not display scrolling text. Limit text to 4 chars
* Optimize hardware module loading

### Fixed
* Restore last brightness after restart (#1388)

### Added
* Set time at app startup (#1405)
* Display alarm indicator (#1406)
fourletterdisplay.label: Fourletterdisplay
fourletterdisplay.longdescription:
This application installs all needed to use Four-letter pHAT from Piromoni.
It allows to display informations from your device (like weather temperature, CPU usage and more) through four letters.
Long text (more than 4 letters) will scroll automatically and displayed dots can be configured individually.
Brightness is also configurable with a night mode with a night mode

gpios.author: Cleep
gpios.changelog:
## [1.1.3] - 2021-07-31

### Changed
* Frontend service doesn't have to catch update events
gpios.label: Gpios
gpios.longdescription: Gives you access to raspberry pins to configure your inputs/ouputs as you wish quickly and easily.

localmusic.author: Cleep
localmusic.changelog:
## [1.1.0] - 2023-03-13
### Changed
- Update storage path according to core changes
- Add tabs to config page

### Added
- Keep last playback to restore it even if player destroyed
- Properly handle alarm creating and destroying player
- Add button to play playlist directly from app
- Handle alarm snoozed
localmusic.description: Create your music playlist with device files
localmusic.label: Local music
localmusic.longdescription: Create your playlist with music files uploaded to your devices

network.author: Cleep
network.description: Configure how your device connect to your network
network.label: Network
network.longdescription: Application that helps you to configure device network connection

openweathermap.author: Cleep
openweathermap.description: Gets weather conditions using OpenWeatherMap service
openweathermap.label: Openweathermap
openweathermap.longdescription:
This application gets data from OpenWeatherMap online service and displays it directly on your device dashboard.
OpenWeatherMap allows to get for free current weather condition and 5 days forecast.
This application also broadcasts weather event on all your devices.

parameters.author: Cleep
parameters.changelog:
## [2.2.0] - 2023-03-10
### Changed
- Clean code
- Update code after core changes (profiles)

### Added
- Add function to return current time data
parameters.description: Configure generic parameters of your device
parameters.label: Parameters
parameters.longdescription: Application that helps you to configure generic parameters of your device

sensors.author: Cleep
sensors.changelog:
## v1.1.0 - 2021-05-24

* Migration to python3
* Update after core changes
* Update after gpios changes
* Improve code quality and confidence
sensors.description: Implements easily and quickly sensors like temperature, motion, light...
sensors.label: Sensors
sensors.longdescription: With this module you will be able to follow environment temperature, detect some motion around your device, detect when light level is dim... and trigger some action according to those stimuli.

system.author: Cleep
system.changelog:
## [2.2.0] - 2023-03-09
### Fixed
- Led state is not properly restored after a reboot

### Changed
- Restore original activity led trigger mode to default mode (mmc0) when enabled again
- Force option added to reboot and halt device functions
system.description: Helps controlling and monitoring the device
system.label: System
system.longdescription: Application that helps you to configure your system

teleinfo.author: Cleep
teleinfo.changelog:
## [1.1.2] - 2021-07-31

### Fixed
* Fix widget that wasn't displayed
teleinfo.description: Gets house power consumption infos from Enedis electric power meter
teleinfo.label: Teleinfo
teleinfo.longdescription:
This application reads data from Enedis Linky (or older compatible version) house power meter and make
possible to monitor your house power consumption usage and build charts on some useful indicators.

update.author: Cleep
update.changelog:
## [1.3.0] - 2023-02-12
### Changed
- Use new core AppsSources lib to handle multi apps sources
update.label: Update
update.longdescription: Manage all Cleep applications and Cleep core updates.
